Charge-Bound Warhammer

1d10 (1d8) +1 Bludgeoning

Weapon Enchantment +1

This hammer's magical powers only function if it's Bound to an Eldritch Knight or is a Warlock's Pact Weapon.

Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and attack rolls. Shocking Bound: This weapon deals an additional 1~6 Lightning damage.
